author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Pass update test #13 (bail when receive a file or dir named .svn) and
update test #25 (obstructed update alters WC properties) by not losing
errors on update and supporting copies of directories.
(open_dir): Don't lose errors when adding a dir.
(finish_report): Don't lose error when we close all dirs.
(setup_copy_file_headers): this to disambiguate with dir COPY variant.
(setup_copy_dir_headers): Variant of setup_copy_file_headers with Depth: inf
(add_directory): Support copying of dirs if we're passed the 'right' vals.

author: dlr
msg: Declare dispose(jobject) as part of the SVNBase API, since it is
common to both SVNClient and SVNAdmin.  Could be thought of as a
(dispose): Add new public, pure virtual method.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Pass commit test #27 (commit with conflicts and check txn in repo)
(setup_copy_headers): Cast to char* as we know we'll lose const.  Blame apr.
(close): Don't abort() on error, but return something.

author: dlr
msg: Add hook script support for Windows Script Host (.wsf) files.  Though
WSH also allows for invocation of JScript (.js) and VB Script (.vbs)
files, the file extensions for these are not explicitly enumerated
because the languages can be run via a .wsf file.
